Tolkien]]'s [[Middle-earth]] universe, '''Angrod''' (pronounced {{IPA-art|ˈaŋɡrɔd|}}) was a son of [[Finarfin]] and lord of the [[Noldor]]. Angrod was the elder brother of [[Galadriel]] and [[Aegnor]], and the younger brother of [[Finrod Felagund]]. He joined the [[Exiles (Middle-earth)|Exile of the Noldor]] to [[Middle-earth]], where together with Aegnor he held the highlands of [[Dorthonion]] against [[Morgoth]] in the [[Dagor Aglareb]]. Aegnor and Angrod were both killed in the [[Dagor Bragollach]].<ref>{{ME-ref|Silm|"Of the Ruin of Beleriand"}}</ref> His wife was an [[Elf (Middle-earth)|Elven]] lady named '''''Eldalótë''''' ({{IPA|[ɛlʲdaˈloːtɛ]}}, meaning 'Elven-flower'; ''Eðellos'' {{IPA|[ɛˈðɛlʲlɔθ]}} in Sindarin). His son was [[Orodreth]], who escaped to [[Nargothrond]] when his father was slain. Angrod was thus the grandfather of [[Gil-galad]], Orodreth's son. His name was a [[Sindarin|Sindarized]] form of his [[Teleri]]n [[Quenya]] name '''''Angaráto''''' {{IPA|[aŋɡaˈraːtɔ]}}, which means "Iron-noble" or "iron champion". This is a reference to his hands of great strength and an early received ''[[epessë]]'' '''Angamaitë''' 'iron-handed'.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.glyphweb.com/arda/a/angrod.html |title=Angrod |work=The Encyclopedia of Arda |publisher=Mark Fisher |date=5 January 2009}}</ref> {{Finarfin}} ==Earlier versions of the legendarium== In the published ''The Silmarillion'', Orodreth is given as Angrod's brother instead, following non-final versions of the story.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.glyphweb.com/arda/o/orodreth.html |title=Orodreth |work=The Encyclopedia of Arda |publisher=Mark Fisher |date=10 January 2008}}</ref> This was an editorial decision by [[Christopher Tolkien]] which he admitted as a mistake. ==See also== {{Portal|Middle-earth}} *[[House of Bëor]] *[[House of Finwë]] == References == {{Reflist}} {{Middle-earth}} [[Category:High Elves]] [[Category:Characters in The Silmarillion]] [[Category:Noldor]] [[Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1977]] [[Category:Fictional nobility]] {{MiddleEarth-char-stub}} [[it:Lista di Elfi di Arda#A]] [[pl:Lista Calaquendich#Angord]]
